18512.「ああっ！ 大変だよ！\n 大変なことに なっちゃった！: Oh, my God! Oh, my God! We're in trouble!

18513.「王さまが 大軍を率いて 行っちゃったの！\n 博士さんも 行っちゃった！:
The king has gone with his army! And the
doctor's gone!

18514.「うう……。暗黒大樹に 行ったんだよ。\n ボク 兵士さんの話を聞いたんだ。:
I went to the Dark Tree. I heard the soldier's
story.

18515.「暗黒大樹を 破壊しにいくって！: He's going to destroy the Dark Tree!

18516.「ボ…ボク イヤだよ。\n 博士さんも パパも みんな いい人なのに……:
I don't like it. You and Dad are such good
people...

18517.「エルフと 大樹の番人が\n 戦うなんて おかしいよ。:
It's crazy that Elf and the Keeper of the
Trees are fighting.

18518.「ね…ねえ ボクを\n 暗黒大樹に 連れてって。: Hey...take me to the Dark Tree.

18519.「ボク 戦いを止めたいんだ。\n お…お願いします。: I want to stop fighting. Please...please.

18520.「あ…ありがと！\n ボクの頼みを 聞いてくれて！: Thank you! For doing what I asked!

18522.「あ…ありがと！\n でも ほかの人たちの頼まれごとで\n なんだか いっぱいみ:
Thanks! But he seems to be full of other
people's requests...

18523.「は…早くしないと 戦いが始まっちゃう！\n 用事が済んだら すぐに戻ってきてね:
We've got to hurry, or the fight will start!
Come back as soon as you're done!

18524.「そ…そんな。\n 早くしないと 戦いが始まっちゃう……。:
Oh, no. If we don't hurry, the fight will
start...

18525.「でも ほかに頼める人がいないし\n ど…どうすればいいんだろ。:
But there is no one else I can ask, so...what
should I do?

18526.「ニコロイ王は ご不在だ。\n すまないが また後で来てくれ。:
King Nikoroi is not here. I'm sorry, but
you'll have to come back later.

18527.「ボク エルフたちと\n 大樹の番人が戦うのを 止めたい。\n ボ…ボクを 暗黒:
I want to stop the Elves from fighting the
Keeper of the Tree. Take me to the Dark Tree.

18528.「あ…暗黒大樹の場所は 覚えてる？\n 城を出たら 北へ進んで\n カミハルムイ:
Uh...do you remember where the Dark Tree is?
When you leave the castle, go north to
Kamiharmui Area North.

18529.「北西に進んで 落陽の草原に着いたら\n 西に まっすぐ進むんだよ。:
Go northwest, and when you reach Sunset
Meadow, go straight west.

18531.「そなたが ここの長だな？: You're the head of this place?

18533.「暗黒大樹の長よ……。聞いてくれ。\n 今 暗黒大樹が活性化し\n 各地で 魔瘴:
Tree Chief of the Dark Tree, listen to me. The Dark Tree has been activated, and demon miasma is occurring one after another in various
places.

18534.「このままでは 遠からず\n エルトナ大陸は 魔瘴により 滅びるだろう。\n 滅:
At this rate, Eltona Continent will soon be
destroyed by demon miasma. There is only one
way to escape this destruction.

18537.「私の後方には 大勢の兵士が控えている。\n 号令をかければ 大挙して押し寄せる:
I have a large number of soldiers behind me.
If I give the order, they will come in droves.

18538.「……そうなれば 双方とも\n 大きな被害が出ることは まぬがれん。\n できれ:
If that happens, there will be heavy damage on
both sides. We want to avoid a fight if at all
possible.

18539.「どうだ？\n ムダな血を流す前に 退いてもらえぬか？:
How about it? Will you please step aside
before we spill blood for nothing?

18542.「大樹の破壊\n お前たちの寿命を 縮めるだけ。:
The destruction of the great tree will only
shorten your lifespan.

18543.「我々の寿命を 縮めるだと……？\n いったい どういうことだ？:
Shortening our lifespan? What the hell is
going on?

18544.「ムリだ。言っても わからない。\n お前たち 見たものしか信じない。:
I can't do it. Even if I told you, you
wouldn't understand. You only believe what you
see.

18545.「……そうか。\n 残念だが 交渉の余地は なさそうだな。: I see. I'm afraid that's not negotiable.

18546.「許せ！！ 暗黒大樹の番人たちよ！！: Forgive me! O Dark Tree Guardians!

18548.「震動……！？ 地面から！？\n ま…まずい！！: Tremors...! From the ground! Oh no!

18549.「王さま 危険です！\n 早く この場から離れてください！:
My king, it's dangerous! Get out of here,
quickly!

18555.「しくじったわ……。逃げおくれた……。: I screwed up... I missed the run...

18558.「ねえ！ 博士さんを助けにいこう！: Hey! Let's go help the doctor!

18561.「ましょううおを 倒したか。\n お前 勇気ある者だ。:
You have defeated Mashououou? You are a brave
man.

18562.「ハッパ。強い仲間 持ったな。: Happa. You got a strong companion.

18564.「パパ……？\n 暗黒大樹の長が 育ての親だったのね……。:
Papa...? The Dark Tree Chief was your foster
parent...

18566.「暗黒大樹が光り\n 魔瘴を 取り込んでいった！？: The Dark Tree shone and took in demon miasma!

18569.「ふふっ。まいった……。\n これは 想像以上の発見だわ。:
Phew. My goodness... this is a find beyond
anything I could have imagined.

18570.「この樹は 魔瘴を取り込み 浄化することで\n 魔瘴から エルトナ大陸を守ってき:
So this tree has protected Eltona Continent
from demon miasma by taking in and purifying
it.

18572.「そうだ。お前 賢い者だ。: That's right. You are a wise man.

18573.「エルトナ大陸に発生した 魔瘴。\n 聖なる大樹 魔瘴を取り込んでいき\n どん:
The demon miasma occurred in Eltona Continent.
The sacred tree, which has taken in demon
miasma, has become blacker and blacker.

18574.「なにも知らない エルフたち。\n いつからか 聖なる大樹を\n 暗黒大樹と呼ぶ:
Elfs who know nothing. Somewhere along the
line, they started calling the Sacred Tree the
Dark Tree.

18575.「だけど長年 魔瘴を取り込んだせいで\n この樹の はたらきは 徐々に弱まってい:
However, the workings of this tree have gradually weakened due to the demon miasma it has taken in over the years. The power to take
in demon miasma has gradually decreased...

18576.「取り込みきれず あふれた魔瘴が\n 今 各地で ふきだしている。\n 暗黒大樹:
Untreated demon miasma is now swirling in the
air in many places. The true nature of the
Dark Tree is...

18577.「すなわち 世界樹。そういうことね？: Yggdrasil. That's what it is, isn't it?

18579.「な…なんだと！？\n この暗黒大樹が 大いなる緑の象徴！？:
What...what? This Dark Tree is the symbol of
the Great Green!

18580.「はるか昔から 私たちエルフを\n 見守り続けてきた 世界樹だというのか……？:
Yggdrasil that has been watching over us Elfs
since time immemorial...?

18581.「大樹の番人 大樹を見守るのが役目。\n 誰にも ジャマさせない。:
The Great Tree Guardian's role is to watch
over the Great Tree. He won't let anyone
interfere.

18585.「うん……。\n ボク 博士さんの所で\n いっぱい お手伝いしたから……。: Well, I helped out a lot at your place, so...

18588.「賢い者か。\n お前に 感謝する。: You are a wise man. Thank you.

18589.「……ハッパ。なぜ お前を\n ここから 追いだしたのか話す。:
...Happa. I'll tell you why I kicked you out
of here.

18590.「大樹 芯まで 濃い魔瘴に覆われた。\n 芯 大樹の命。:
The Great Tree's core, the life of the Great
Tree, was covered in thick miasma.

18591.「大樹 もうすぐ 限界。\n 魔瘴を 取り込めなくなる。:
The tree is almost at its limit. We can't take
in demon miasma anymore.

18592.「ここ 濃い魔瘴だらけになったら\n エルフの お前 生きていけなくなる。\n:
If this place is full of thick demon miasma,
you, an Elf, won't be able to survive. That's
why I sent you away.

18594.「これも 自然の意志。: This is also the will of nature.

18597.「王さま。ひとまず 城に戻りましょう。:
Dear King. Let's go back to the castle for
now.

18601.「暗黒大樹と呼ばれてた樹が 世界樹だった……。\n はるか昔から 魔瘴を取り込み:
The Dark Tree, as it was called, was the Yggdrasil... and it's been taking in demon miasmas and purifying them for ages, and now
it's reaching its limits. I don't know...

18603.「……あたしの研究は ムダだったってわけね。\n 魔瘴の増加は おさえられないし:
So my research was all for nothing. I wonder
if we're finished now that the demon miasma
can't be controlled...

18606.「あ…あのね。\n 暗黒大樹の芯を覆う 魔瘴って\n どうにか できないかな？:
Uh...you know. Can't you do something about
the demon miasma that covers the core of the
Dark Tree?

18608.「大樹の芯から 魔瘴がなくなれば\n 魔瘴を取り込むチカラが 回復するんでしょ？:
If the core of the tree is free of demon
miasma, it will regain its ability to take in
demon miasma, right?

18609.「そしたら 各地に現れた魔瘴も\n また 暗黒大樹が取り込んで 浄化するように\:
Then the demon miasma that appears in various
places might also be taken in and purified by
the Dark Tree... Is there any way to do that?

18610.「多くの研究者が 今も\n 魔瘴を 消滅させる方法を調べてるけど\n まだ 誰に:
Many researchers are still trying to figure
out how to eliminate the demon miasma, but no
one has been able to do it yet...

18611.「もう 時間も残されてないし\n 今から調べても 間に合わないわ……。:
We don't have much time left, and if we start
looking now, we'll never get there in time...

18612.「そうなの？\n でも 博士さんなら きっと できるよ。: Is that so? But I'm sure you can do it.

18614.「そうだよ！\n だって 博士さんは天才だもん！: That's right! Because you are a genius!

18616.「へへ！ そうよね！\n まだ 終わったわけじゃないわ！: Hehe! I know, right? ! It's not over yet!

18617.「魔瘴を消滅させる方法さえ 突き止めれば\n いいんだし こんなの楽勝だわ！:
If only we could figure out how to make the
demon miasma disappear, this would be a piece
of cake!

18618.「よーし！ いちから出直しよ！\n 魔瘴を消滅させる方法は あたしが\n なんと:
All right! Let's start from scratch! I'll find
a way to eliminate the demon miasma, no matter
what it takes!

18620.「ハラが減っては いくさは できぬってね！\n なんか 栄養のあるもの買ってきて:
You can't do well if you're hungry! Get me
something nourishing!

18622.「えへへ！ 暗黒大樹に\n 連れてってくれて ありがとね！\n これ！ ボクから:
Hehehe! Thanks for taking me to Dark Tree!
Here! It's my way of saying thank you!

18623.「えへへ！\n ボク 買い物 行ってくるね！: Heh heh heh! I'm going shopping!
